USB regulator configuration
[USB application configuration]


Defines

#define USE_USB_PADS_REGULATOR   ENABLE

Define Documentation

#define USE_USB_PADS_REGULATOR   ENABLE

Enable the internal regulator for USB pads When the application voltage is lower than 3.5V, to optimize power consumption the internal USB pads regulatr can be disabled.
